Job Title: Director \- Data Visualization Scientist ?? Artificial Intelligence AI Express

Overview

AI Express is a recently announced service from Mastercard which helps companies swiftly adopt AI\. AI Express is a structured quick engagement where Mastercard develops a working AI model for the customer on an emergent problem the customer has identified, and provides the deployment know\-how to implement the solution\. During AI Express, Mastercard leverages the award\-winning Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning technologies of Brighterion, a company we recently acquired\. You will be part of the AI Express and Brighterion Team which pushes the boundaries of innovation for pure Artificial Intelligence technologies with a culture focused on delivering the results our clients expect and deserve\.

Our innovative cross\-channel AI solutions are applied in Fortune 500 companies in industries such as fin\-tech, investment banking, biotech, and insurance\. We are pursuing a highly motivated individual who has strong customer relationship management and problem solving skills\. This individual will have strong achievement orientation, resilience, diligence, and the ability to research and innovate to provide the AI Express model development team with the newest and most efficient technologies\.

Role

Help the AI Express team develop data visualizations for internal and customer engagements

Explore and recommend emerging technologies and techniques to support/enhance common visualization patterns and components

Write complex queries and manage data transformation to enable analytics, reporting and product features

Help analyze, visualize, and provide analytics on data/metrics to build reporting solutions to support various company initiatives

Participate in the creation and support of data visualization development standards

All About You

Strong Mathematics background

Experience in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning preferred

Experience in Computer Graphics \(OpenGL, 3D modeling, linear algebra\) and related tools\.

Experience with SQL

Web development experience, including JavaScript, CSS, HTML, SVG, Canvas and WebGL\.

Experience with responsive user interfaces and data visualization; Experiences with application frameworks \(Angular\), and graphics libraries \(D3\.js, Three\.js, Vega etc\)\.

Problem solver

Creative and ingenious

BS in computer science or a related field

Strong communication skills; prior experience in customer\-facing engagements is a plus
